nodes.bodyText: "/viewerconfig/" is repeated in this file. Should be a constant.
Ah yes! Thank you. There was one, now there are two. I'll rework.
I'm assuming that it also handles the same for an empty string MIME type? Have you tested that?
I'll have a play. I am/was hoping the framework looks after that - as swagger shows them as mandatory, so I'm thinking it should know what's going on. But... not confident in that. 😉
I have now tested, and yes. Seeing it's path vars, if you start dropping some etc then it triggers the 404. So all good.
